Name: Model Building Restoration
About the game: Disassemble old car models, remove rust and reassemble. You have to disassemble the model of the car into parts, remove the rust and then put the car back together. You can also put it on the ground and plant trees. Using the mouse and keyboard, the player needs to disassemble the rusty car into parts and decompose them so that to remember where which part was, then you need to clean each part of the rust and then assemble the car in parts back. Then the player can create a panorama for the car by placing a piece of land and trees under it.
